appName: Forklift Simulator VR - Realistic Fork lifter Operator
displayName: Forklift Simulator VR - Realistic Fork lifter Operator
display_name: Forklift Simulator VR - Realistic Fork lifter Operator
display_long_description:
🚜 Step into the world of forklift simulation! Experience the ultimate challenge of mastering a forklift in this immersive VR simulator. Navigate complex tasks that test your precision and skill while becoming a pro at operating a fork lifter.

Tutorial Mode
📚 Designed for beginners, this mode offers comprehensive training on essential forklift simulator operations. Learn how to effectively lift, tilt, and maneuver loads of various sizes and weights. Step-by-step guidance builds your confidence for upcoming challenges.

Test Mode
🎯 Put your skills to the test! In Test Mode, face intricate tasks demanding accuracy and speed. Objectives include:

Transporting Loads: Move items efficiently using your forklift.
Lifting Items: Elevate loads to specific heights.
At the end of each session, your performance is recorded on a leaderboard, letting you compare scores and strive for the title of ultimate forklift simulator operator.

Coming Soon – Parking Mode
🚗 Exciting Parking Mode ahead! Lift and park vehicles using your fork lifter. This innovative gameplay blends traditional forklift simulation with vehicle handling, offering fresh challenges for all players.

Why Choose Forklift VR?
🌟 Immerse yourself in stunning environments designed for realistic forklift simulation. Ultimate forklift simulator perfect your skills or aim for leaderboard glory in forklift VR and improve your parking and driving skills. Are you ready to become the ultimate forklift master?
